dict.acceptation: 钱，货币；款项；薪水，报酬；大富翁；

sent.orig: No, by money, here I mean that he performs consistently at a high level.
sent.trans: 噢，这儿的money不是指钱，是指他打球一直保持在高水平上，一直打得很棒。

sent.orig: The compiler considers only declarations that appear before the use of Money.
sent.trans: 编译器只考虑出现在Money使用之前的声明。

sent.orig: Therefore many inspiration many money wielded sprinkles this originally ordinary wall.
sent.trans: 于是许多的灵感许多的money都挥洒到了这面原本普通的墙壁。

sent.orig: Money for Jam, Money for Old Rope, money for Nothing.
sent.trans: 这是举手之劳而到手的钱，找窍门到手的钱，不劳而获的钱。
